snippet: Adi Nes explores issues of Israeli identity and masculinity in his work. His latest project, "The Village," is on display at Jack Shainman Gallery in New York.
abstract: Adi Nes explores issues of Israeli identity and masculinity in his work. His latest project, "The Village," is on display at Jack Shainman Gallery in New York.

byline.original: By JAMES ESTRIN and DAVID FURST

headline.main: Underpinnings of Greek Tragedy in Israel
